Stem: Erect, solitary or branched from the base. Hairless or sparsely hairy. Pale green.
Leaves: Oblong lance-shaped with a blunt tip. Usually deeply lobed.
Flowers: White with 4 petals and pinkish or green outer parts.
FruitSeeds: Flattened triangular pods with a notch on the long edge. Contain 20-odd oblong orange-yellow seeds.
